description: Tim is really my type of guy.  He's young, very good looking and has that preppy image. He called us and said he was 'curious' about doing adult videos.  Though he initially thought he'd be fucking a girl, we persuaded him to jack off for our cameras.He is an aspiring racecar driver and hopes to go professional one day.  In his bio clips Tim tells how he loves fucking groupies and talks about the rush he gets from the speed -   sometimes he feels like busting his nut all over the steering wheel. That I'd like to see!Tim was a little nervous at first, but he became comfortable rather quickly.  Though he would never admit to it, I think he got off on someone watching him stroke his dick. It was a little difficult for me too - as it took a lot to not pounce on him when his dick was less than a foot from my face.
title: Speedway Image, Scene #02
